titlestmt.titleproper: Hertz Burgin Typescript: History of Jewish Labor Movement TAM.249
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Tamiment staff

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2012-03-29T19:10-0400

did.unittitle: Hertz Burgin Typescript: History of Jewish Labor Movement

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Hertz Burgin (b. 1870) was the author of Die Geshiskhte fun der Idisher Arbayter Bevegung in Amerika, Rusland un England (Feraynigte idishe geverkshaften, New York, 1915), i.e.."The History of the Jewish Labor Movement.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Contains a typescript, "History of the Jewish Labor Movement," "translated from the Yiddish by a student assistant" (1962; 301 pp.).
PLEASE DIRECT FURTHER INQUIRIES TO: tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu
